text: I forgot my password, can you help me reset it?
Sure, I can definitely help you. I need your username and email to get started.
My username is foo and my email is foo@example.com.
Alright.
You have been sent a verification code. Please provide me with that code to reset your password.
The verification code is 970420.
What's your new password?
My new password is newpassword.
Great.
Your password has been successfully reset.
I want to delete my account.
Okay, to delete your account, I need your token.
But, I see that I don't have your token. Can you please provide me with your username and password so that I can get your token and then proceed with your account deletion?
Yes, my username is foo and my password is newpassword.
Perfect.
I have received your token. Please confirm that you want to delete your account.
Yes, I want to delete my account.
Okay, I will delete your account.
Your account has been successfully deleted.
I want to register for an account.
Sure, I can help you with that. Please provide me with your username, password, and email.
My username is foo, my password is bar, and my email is foo@example.com.
Thank you. Let me call the RegisterUser API to register your account.
Congratulations, your account has been successfully registered. You have received your token on your email.
Can you help me with anything else?
No, thank you. You can type 'bye' to exit the session.
